writing_guidelines.description: Provide unique, relevant content that is truly useful to the user.
Do not add filler, fluffy or spammy content.
Repeat the product name once in the product short description.
Do not provide the same copy to multiple online retailers; it needs to be unique and original to Walmart.

summary: The page outlines Search Engine Optimization (SEO) strategies for product descriptions, emphasizing the importance of unique content and best practices for enhancing visibility on search engines. Guidelines include providing relevant content, avoiding filler, and ensuring originality for Walmart.
